entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -31.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
